name: Alpha Pro Tech, Ltd.
description: Alpha Pro Tech, Ltd. is a leading manufacturer of protective apparel and building products, catering to various industries including healthcare, construction, and industrial sectors. Established in 1983, the company is headquartered in Markham, Ontario, Canada. Alpha Pro Tech specializes in the production of high-quality personal protective equipment (PPE), including face masks, gowns, and other protective apparel aimed at safeguarding individuals in medical and industrial environments. The company has gained recognition for its innovative approaches to safety and hygiene, particularly during the COVID-19 pandemic when demand for PPE surged. In addition to its PPE offerings, Alpha Pro Tech produces building materials such as weather-resistant barrier products, which enhance energy efficiency and sustainability in construction projects. The company's commitment to quality, safety, and environmental responsibility has positioned it as a trusted partner in the industries it serves. With a robust distribution network and a focus on research and development, Alpha Pro Tech aims to continue addressing the evolving needs of its customers while expanding its market presence.
